Articles.Content:
I made a trailer for the Component Space Shuttle. Feel free to give me any constructive criticism.

Thanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/A92utiABNFw?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
It\'s pretty neat. Why\'d you keep the ET attached the entire time? It doesn\'t actually have any fuel in it. Regardless, you\'ll like the next version.
I found out it was usless during the end of the video.

needs shuttle engines. 

also, if you make shuttle engines. you should try to add detail about the upper part of the engine even though it sits inside the shuttle. it would still look nice ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> needs shuttle engines. 
> 
> also, if you make shuttle engines. you should try to add detail about the upper part of the engine even though it sits inside the shuttle. it would still look nice ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Think about what you said there.
Thanks I love the end. At first i was like I\'ll make a nice land on KSC. But I really wanted to show off the amazing physics on the shuttle! =P

> 
> needs shuttle engines.

> ![7145151347_4197ff3069_c.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7052/7145151347_4197ff3069_c.jpg)
> ![7145167339_024ed4a9c5_c.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7264/7145167339_024ed4a9c5_c.jpg)
> 
> ![7145150831_84c0087de0_c.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7226/7145150831_84c0087de0_c.jpg)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> > 
> > Personally, I really like the detail and color on Ben\'s (the one with red), but I like how Epsigma\'s is pretty close to real scale. Hmm, now that I think about it, if Ben\'s was shorter, and a little more \'plump\' (for lack of a better word) it would be perfect. I\'ll put more angles up soon. Also, hat tip to CBBP for the reference photos. 
> 

And here\'s the second set.

It\'s still in progress, mind you.
What Space Shuttle forotten on moon???
